forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
